content: As we look at the second quarter, we’ll see sequential improvement from a couple of items that we have inventories in the first quarter, which we’ll have Upfit back online in  we’ll have our truck body facility that Daryl talked about back online in April executing at a high level. I think if we go back to some of our previous calls, we’ve talked about even the confidence we’ve had, the inability of our customers since COVID started to do a number of things due to the chassis constraints. I’ll leave it there, guys. I’ll leave it there, guys.
